"We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it." Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Abu Musab al-Zarqawi , a Jordanian extremist with ties to the al-Qaida terrorist network. Guantanamo Bay one of world's finest prisons: Donald Rumsfeld THE "war on terror" prison at the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba is one of the finest prison systems in the world, former defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld has said. Donald Rumsfeld , who is promoting his autobiography Known and Unknown, praised US military personnel who worked at the site in the interview on Fox News Channel's Hannity show.
